author: Ed Scarce
title: Stunning Bradley Attack Takes Out Ballyhooed Russian T-90 Tank | Crooks and Liars
text: On the face of it, this is just absurd. Far lighter Bradley Fighting Vehicles equipped with 25mm guns, a glorified, albeit deadly machine gun (or more accurately, " [chain gun](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chain_gun)") should have stood no chance against the Russian-made T-90 with its 125mm cannon. The 25mm guns just don't have enough firepower to pierce the heavy armor of the 45-ton T-90 (or so we've been told) while the Russian tank can level multi-story buildings. Apparently, no one told the Ukrainians that though and they attacked the tank and destroyed it in a firefight. So how was that possible? Somehow, with some clever maneuvering and precise aim, they were able to hit the tank in a vulnerable area, under the turret or through the barrel of the cannon itself and destroy the tank. Ridiculously brave fighting. Source: [Task & Purpose ](https://taskandpurpose.com/news/bradley-fighting-vehicles-russian-t90-tanks-ukraine/) One of Russia’s most modern main battle tanks, a T-90, was captured on video losing a face-to-face duel with a Ukrainian Bradley Fighting Vehicle, a far lighter-armed and armored U.S.-made troop carrier whose design dates to the Vietnam War. Drone footage released on social media channels captured fighting that is said to be on the outskirts of the city of Avdiivka, as two M-2 Bradleys took on a Russian T-90, the most advanced and modern tank in the Russian armed forces. And as the video shows, the Bradleys essentially ran circles around it, even though the T-90 got to shoot first. The Bradley — which we cannot stress enough is not a tank — is lighter armed and lighter armored than a T-90. But in the shoot out captured on drone video, the Ukrainian armored vehicles manage to outmaneuver it, hitting it with a constant, accurate barrage of rounds from their 25mm guns. Notably, the Bradleys appears to deliver near-perfect hits on the T-90 even though the Ukrainian vehicles are moving over uneven, snow-covered ground — an example of the vehicle’s fire control software and equipment, which automatically adjusts the aim of the M242 Bushmaster to account for both the Bradley’s movements and its target. The 25mm cannon may not sound like much compared to the 125mm main cannon on the T-90, but the Bradley’s M242 can fire 200 rounds per minute of armor-piercing ammunition. The Bradley fires are sabot rounds, which have depleted uranium cores, making a bullet hard enough to penetrate so-called “light armor.” The swift maneuvering, coordination and accurate fire of the Ukranian vehicles also suggests well-trained crews. The Russian tank, on the other hand, misses with its shots and does little to evade its predictment, suggesting its crew was not particularly prepared for combat. Eventually the heavily damaged tank crashes into a tree. The video appears to show the crew, still alive, abandoning the tank. Ukraine's Ministry of Defense (and trolling) with the honors. A longer version, with the footage sped up 5x to show the entire battle. This seems to be the prevailing reaction on Twitter. Amazement. Naturally, in the Russian version of events, (the one that doesn't show the T-90 crashing into a tree and several crew members running for their lives) they claimed victory.

author: A TARDE
title: Bolsonaro é alvo de pedido de responsabilização criminal; saiba mais
text: GESTÃO NA PANDEMIA Bolsonaro é alvo de pedido de responsabilização criminal; saiba mais Pedido é de autoria do Conselho Nacional de Direitos Humanos O ex-presidente [Jair Bolsonaro](https://atarde.com.br/politica/bolsonaro-diz-que-sera-candidato-em-2026-pessoal-tem-saudade-de-mim-1292532) (PL) se tornou alvo de um pedido de responsabilização criminal pela gestão da pandemia da Covid-19 durante seu governo, entre 2020 e 2022. A solicitação feita à Procuradoria-Geral da República (PGR) é de autoria do Conselho Nacional de Direitos Humanos (CNDH) e do Conselho Nacional de Saúde (CNS). Leia mais [>> Bolsonaro diz que será candidato em 2026: “Pessoal tem saudade de mim"](https://atarde.com.br/politica/bolsonaro-diz-que-sera-candidato-em-2026-pessoal-tem-saudade-de-mim-1292532)[>> PL Bahia entra em 'ebulição' e Eduardo Bolsonaro expõe deputado baiano](https://atarde.com.br/politica/pl-bahia-entra-em-ebulicao-e-eduardo-bolsonaro-expoe-deputado-baiano-1292800)[>> Flávio Bolsonaro acusa ministro do STF de fortalecer facções](https://atarde.com.br/politica/flavio-bolsonaro-acusa-ministro-do-stf-de-fortalecer-faccoes-1292795) Os dois conselhos afiram que Bolsonaro e os ministros Marcelo Queiroga (Saúde), Eduardo Pazuello (Saúde) e Walter Braga (Defesa) teria "sabotado" as medidas para o enfrentamento da pandemia, com posições contrárias ao que era recomendado pela Organização Mundial da Saúde (OMS). Durante a pandemia, Bolsonaro foi na contramão da maioria dos países e de autoridades locais, apontando que medidas como o isolamento social prejudicariam a economia do país. O então presidente também fez campanha contra a vacinação. “O número exorbitante de casos e óbitos por Covid-19 notificados, sem contar aqueles que não o foram, é notoriamente o resultado da política sanitária adotada pelo governo do ex-Presidente da República Jair Messias Bolsonaro que se posicionou na contramão das orientações da comunidade científica, da OMS, e mesmo da mais singela razoabilidade, participando de forma decisiva, por atos e omissões, da propagação do vírus no território nacional, que resultou na morte de centenas de milhares de brasileiros e brasileiras”, diz trecho do documento. Compartilhe essa notícia com seus amigos Cidadão Repórter Contribua para o portal com vídeos, áudios e textos sobre o que está acontecendo em seu bairro [ACESSAR](/reporter-cidadao)

author: ferguson
title: Re: Full Fibre upgrade half the speed it should be
text:
We’re here 24/7. 365 days a year.
Ask questions. Find your answers. Connect.

author: Morgan McKenzie
title: Learn about Centennial Area Health Education Center's work at Friday's 'AHEC of a Party'
text:
Centennial Area Health Education Center will host “AHEC of a Party” from 10 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Friday at the LINC Library, 501 8th Ave., Greeley.
The event will showcase collaborative efforts to improve health outcomes in northeastern Colorado through an interactive mental health education exhibit, a virtual dementia tour, Anatomy in Clay and health care career exploration programs, according to a Centennial Area Health Education Center news release.
Be Mindful, It Matters, which is available at the library through May 15, will offer interactive mental health education. The exibit will feature two mental health trainings conducted by North Range Behavioral Health: Mental Health 101 and Self Care for the Real World. Representatives from 988 Colorado will also be on-site.
The educational exhibit, made possible by the Weld Trust, formed from a partnership between the University of Northern Colorado and Aims Community College students, nonprofit partners and community members.
Area Health Education Centers have existed since 1977, working behind the scenes to support the health care workforce and provide health education to communities, according to Melissa Jensen, executive director of the Centennial Area Health Education Center. But the center is still unknown to many.
“We need to change that so more organizations want to collaborate with us to expand our reach,” Jensen said.
Although based in Greeley, Centennial Area Health Education Center serves 12 counties in northeastern Colorado. For more information, go to cahec.org.
